scripts.prod:start: yarn prod:build && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml up -d
scripts.prod:build: cd app && yarn && yarn build && cd .. && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml build
scripts.start:app: wrap () { docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.override.yml -f "$*"/"$*".yml up -d; }; wrap
scripts.stop:app: wrap () { docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.override.yml -f "$*"/"$*".yml down && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.override.yml -f "$*"/"$*".yml rm -vf; }; wrap
